title: Database Engines for Geographical Information Systems

references.title: SQL HandleGeographicData?" A Presentationon theworkof theAGI StandardsCommittee'sSQL WorkingParty,AGI

abstract:
Our ability to identify, acquire, store, enquire on and analyse data is increasing as never before, especially in the GIS field. Technologies are becoming available to\ud
manage a wider variety of data and to make intelligent inferences on that data.\ud
The mainstream arrival of large-scale database engines is not far away. The experience of using the first such products tells us that they will radically change data\ud
management in the GIS field
